The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 September is 3,082 (356.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 September, there were 93 new confirmed cases (10.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 August, there were 51 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 82% (42 extra cases).
